oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Stamps Quartet - American Beauty Flour #13 and #14 - 1947-06-04
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of the Stamp Quartet (musical group) performing a variety of gospel tunes. The broadcast is sponsored by the American Beauty Flour. The show is hosted by Roy George (entertainer). The broadcast is recorded at the KWHI radio station in Brenham, Texas. The recording is listed as show number thirteen and fourteen. The recording is from June 04, 1947.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Stamps Quartet; Roy George
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Roy George performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (00:07) American Beauty Flour Theme (Stamps Quartet) -- (00:23) George introduces Frank Stamps -- (00:38) Stamps greets the audience -- (00:56) My Cross (Stamps Quartet) -- (04:47) George performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (05:49) Saved by Amazing Grace (Stamps Quartet) -- (07:47) Heaven (Stamps Quartet) -- (10:16) Heartfelt Religion is Real (Stamps Quartet) -- (12:23) George and Stamp perform an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (13:01) American Beauty Flour Theme (Stamps Quartet) -- (13:23) George performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (13:31) American Beauty Flour Theme (Stamps Quartet) -- (13:46) George introduces Stamps -- (14:02) Stamps greets the audience -- (14:20) Thank God For an Old Fashioned Mother (Stamps Quartet) -- (18:07) George performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (19:04) I'm So Glad My Savior Came (Stamps Quartet) -- (21:13) Memories That Make me Cry (Stamps Quartet) -- (23:34) Stamps performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (23:57) Jesus is With Me (Stamps Quartet) -- (25:43) George performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (26:10) American Beauty Flour Theme (Stamps Quartet)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Stamps Quartet; George, Roy;
